name: Benyamin Bolhassani
title: Senior PHP Developer
description: Full-Stack Developer with 6+ years of experience in PHP/Laravel and Nuxt.js. Expert in building scalable platforms, API design, and leading technical teams. Strong background in SEO, PWA, Filament, and software architecture.

projects.title: Eventoment
projects.description: Social platform for event management with Laravel, Nuxt.js, and REST API. Includes event management system and Firebase notifications.
projects.longDescription: Eventoment is a social networking platform designed for organizing and discovering events. Users can create events, invite friends, and connect with others who share similar interests. The platform features real-time notifications, event discovery, user profiles, and social interactions.

projects.title: Safar360
projects.description: Tourism website for booking flights, trains, hotels, and tours. Complete reservation system for travel services.
projects.longDescription: Safar360 is a comprehensive travel booking platform that enables users to search and book flights, trains, hotels, and tour packages. The platform integrates with multiple travel service providers and payment gateways to provide a seamless booking experience.

projects.title: Faraz Steel Rizan
projects.description: Company automation system for steel casting factory with Laravel/Filament, including database design, custom modules, and process optimization.
projects.longDescription: Faraz Steel Rizan is a comprehensive automation system built for a steel casting factory. The system manages production processes, inventory, ticketing, and administrative tasks. It features a modern admin panel with custom modules tailored to the specific needs of steel manufacturing operations.

projects.title: Azar
projects.description: Catalyst valuation system for automotive catalytic converters with dynamic formula calculations and precious metal price tracking.
projects.longDescription: Azar is a sophisticated B2B application for the automotive scrap metal industry. It calculates the value of catalytic converters based on their precious metal content (Platinum, Palladium, Rhodium). The system features a dynamic formula engine, real-time metal price tracking, and a comprehensive car catalog organized by brands and models.

education.title: Diploma in Mathematics
description: Completed high school diploma with focus on mathematics
Developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills

workExperience.title: Designer & Developer
description: Designed and implemented automation website for steel casting company using Laravel/Filament
Created custom modules and optimized production and administrative processes
Maintained multiple Filament-based websites with advanced features
Developed multilingual (EN/FA) websites with modern architecture

workExperience.title: Team Leader
description: Led the development of Eventoment social platform using Laravel, Nuxt.js, and REST API
Designed and implemented event management system with Firebase notifications
Developed custom Laravel packages including laravel-dynamic-resources for CRUD operations
Implemented REST APIs and designed scalable database structures
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews

workExperience.title: Developer
